messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Santa (was Christmas)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Santa only brings old fashioned toys to our house.  That and a few treats, like jellybeans, a candy cane, maybe some dried fruit.  I like to put wooden
messages.messageBody:
>I guess that I would like it if Santa only brought some little >things-the ones made by elves and not Nintendo or Mattel. Then the >big dollar toys would still be subject to reality
>Cathie

Santa only brings old fashioned toys to our house. That and a few treats, like jellybeans, a candy cane, maybe some dried fruit. I like to put wooden toys, like tops, cars, etc, little animals, blocks, little books, that kind of thing.

Nanci K.
